content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2.
Attempt missed. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
